definitions.definition: To attack , physically or figuratively; to assail .
examples: Tom was accused of assaulting another man outside a nightclub.
Loud music assaulted our ears as we entered the building.

definitions.definition: To threaten or harass . (Can we add an example for this sense?)

main_definition: ( transitive ) To attack , physically or figuratively; to assail .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To threaten or harass . (Can we add an example for this sense?)
